statement.label: requirement-562
statement.requirement:
Notification bundles SHALL contain a FHIR R4 Parameters resource, conforming to the R4 Backported R5 SubscriptionStatus profile, as the first entry

Not sure why, but this requirement is nearly repeated a couple sentences later as "The status entry SHALL be the first entry of each notification bundle." No need to capture that.
